== Puzhathi (CT) (627238) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Puzhathi (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 9.1 sq. km. and harbouring 7083 households with total population of 35212 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 3 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 515 km. Male population is 16924 and female population is 18288. Scheduled Caste population is 2857 and Scheduled Tribes population is 166. Census Location Code of the town is 627238<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (Population 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 63 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 95 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 3 km.
